mapper.select: select id ,email ,password ,name ,phone ,zipcode ,address1 ,address2 ,profile_image as profileImage ,role ,created_at ,updated_at from member where email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2}, profile_image = #{profileImage} WHERE id = #{id}
